data.content: The "Existential Dread Knight" concept presents a fascinating blend of classic fantasy trope and modern philosophical angst. This paladin, while undeniably skilled in combat, is burdened by a profound questioning of their purpose and
data.query:
Magic: The Gathering card design for: Existential Dread Knight
Concept: A paladin who questions the meaning of questing while still being very good at smiting

Research similar existing MTG cards with humorous or unusual concepts.
